# uptimekuma_monitor_ping (Data Source)

Get PING monitor information by ID or name



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (Number) Monitor identifier
- `name` (String) Monitor name

### Read-Only

- `hostname` (String) Hostname to ping
